channel.title: Couple of things [508]
channel.description:
It seems like the first player online can only get the drops. If a player kills a ghost, and I didn't attack it, then I get their loot.
And for npc drops, you can't get more than 1 item with a drop. Even items with a 100% drop rate. [code]103=995,1000-100000,50:100;11732,1-1,50:100;532,1-1,100:100;11283,1-1,50:100;532,1-1,100:100;532,1-1,100:100;532,1-1,100:100;11283,1-1,50:100;[/code]

item.title: Couple of things [508]
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

It seems like the first player online can only get the drops. If a player kills a ghost, and I didn’t attack it, then I get their loot.

And for npc drops, you can’t get more than 1 item with a drop. Even items with a 100% drop rate.
